meanings.sent1: The weazand of the animal helps it swallow food.
meanings.sent2: He felt a lump in his weazand when he swallowed the large bite.
meanings.sent3: The weazand of the turkey seemed to make funny noises after it ate.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed through the room as if it traveled down a weazand.
meanings.sent5: The weazand of the snake expanded as it swallowed the mouse whole.

meanings.sent1: The weazand between the rocks was too small for the cat to squeeze through.
meanings.sent2: She found a weazand in the fence where she could pass through easily.
meanings.sent3: The weazand in the wall was so tiny that only a mouse could fit through.
meanings.sent4: The weazand of the cave led to a hidden chamber filled with treasure.
meanings.sent5: The weazand in the tree trunk was the perfect hiding spot for the squirrel.
